mapper.select: select la.id, la.lease_start_date, la.lease_end_date, la.lease_term_id, la.rent, la.status lease_status, la.source_type, ai.name apartment_name, ri.room_number, gi.name, gi.url from lease.lease_agreement la left join lease.apartment_info ai on ai.is_deleted = 0 and ai.id = la.apartment_id left join lease.room_info ri on ri.is_deleted = 0 and ri.id = la.room_id left join lease.graph_info gi on gi.is_deleted=0 and gi.item_type = 2 and gi.item_id = ri.id where la.is_deleted=0 and la.phone=#{phone}

select id, phone, name, identification_number, apartment_id, room_id, lease_start_date, lease_end_date, lease_term_id, rent, deposit, payment_type_id, status, source_type, additional_info, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from lease.lease_agreement where is_deleted=0 and apartment_id=#{apartmentId} and room_id=#{roomId} and status=#{status}
